name: XML Document Type Definition (DTD)
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension">dtd</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: A formal expression (in XML) of the structural constraints for a class of XML documents, consisting of element and attribute-list declarations.
